meanings.definition: A type of plant tissue characterized by thickened cell walls.
meanings.sent1: The collenchymas in the stem provide support and structure to the plant.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the collenchymas to understand how plants grow and develop.
meanings.sent3: The collenchymas in the plant were so strong, they could probably hold up a tiny umbrella!
meanings.sent4: The collenchymas acted like a fortress, protecting the plant from harm.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the collenchymas looked like sturdy brick walls surrounding the plant cells.
